message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_FV_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: 'Start Date' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XFV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_START_DATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_START_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE_OF_PROVIDERGROUP
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrollment Date of the provider group, %2d.
The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrolment Date of the provider group, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_START_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDERGROUP
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date of the provider group, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE_OF_PROVIDERGROUP
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrollment Date of the provider group, %2d.
The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrolment Date of the provider group, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_END_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDERGROUP
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date of the provider group, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_START_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE_OF_PROVIDER
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrollment Date of the provider, %2d.
The Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrolment Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_START_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDER
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_END_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_ENROLLMENT_DATE_OF_PROVIDER
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrollment Date of the provider, %2d.
The End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrolment Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_END_DATE_LATER_THAN_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDER
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, must be on or before the End Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XFV_END_DATE_EMPTY_AND_END_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_PRESENT
message.locale: The End Date must be entered as there is an End Date on the provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_WITH_SAME_PERIORD_EXISTS_ASSOCIATE_NOT_HAVE_END_DATE
message.locale: This provider, %1s, already exists for this provider group from, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_WITH_SAME_PERIORD_EXISTS
message.locale: This provider, %1s, already exists for this provider group from, %2d to %3d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_CANCELLED_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE
message.locale: The provider group associate has been deleted, it cannot be modified.
The provider group associate has been deleted, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_CANNOT_CANCEL_CANCELLED_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE
message.locale: The provider group associate has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_FV_COMMENT_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is %1n.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_START_DATE_LATER_THAN_CONTRACT_START_DATE
message.locale: The provider group associate is part of a Live contract and hence the Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the contract Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_END_DATE_BEFORE_THAN_CONTRACT_END_DATE
message.locale: The provider group associate is part of a Live contract and hence the End Date, %1d, must be on or after the contract End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_INCLUDED_LIVE_CONTRACT_CANNOT_REMOVED
message.locale: This provider group associate, %1s is included in a 'Live' contract, it cannot be deleted from the provider group.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_ALREADY_ACTIVE_MEMBER
message.locale: This provider, %1s, has an active association with a provider group, %2s, it cannot be associated to another provider group.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_ACTIVE_MEMBER_FROM_TO
message.locale: This provider, %1s, has an active association with a provider group, %2s, from %3d to %4d. It cannot be associated to another provider group.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_ACTIVE_MEMBER_FROM
message.locale: This provider, %1s, has an active association with a provider group, %2s, from %3d. It cannot be associated to another provider group.

message.name: INF_PROVIDERGROUPASSOCIATE_XRV_PART_OF_CONTRACT
message.locale: The provider group associate, %1s, is included on a contract, %2s and will be removed from the contract.
